mapper.insert:
insert into pay_online_info (
id ,
visit_id ,
settle_id ,
his_cust_type ,
his_cust_id ,
app_type ,
med_org_ord ,
sub_org_code ,
refund_reason ,
pay_ord_id ,
order_status ,
org_code ,
patient_name ,
id_type ,
id_no ,
take_medicine_loc ,
push_type ,
scheduled_time ,
redirect_url ,
amount ,
dept_name ,
dept_code ,
dept_loc ,
dr_name ,
dr_lv_name ,
dr_lv_no ,
waiting_num ,
check_item ,
create_time ,
update_time ,
amp_trace_id ,
trace_id ,
org_trace_no ,
red_settle_id
) values (
#{id},
#{visitId},
#{settleId},
#{hisCustType},
#{hisCustId},
#{appType},
#{medOrgOrd},
#{subOrgCode},
#{refundReason},
#{payOrdId},
#{orderStatus},
#{orgCode},
#{patientName},
#{idType},
#{idNo},
#{takeMedicineLoc},
#{pushType},
#{scheduledTime},
#{redirectUrl},
#{amount},
#{deptName},
#{deptCode},
#{deptLoc},
#{drName},
#{drLvName},
#{drLvNo},
#{waitingNum},
#{checkItem},
#{createTime},
#{updateTime},
#{ampTraceId},
#{traceId},
#{orgTraceNo},
#{redSettleId}
)
mapper.select: select id , visit_id , settle_id , his_cust_type , his_cust_id , app_type , med_org_ord , sub_org_code , refund_reason , pay_ord_id , order_status , org_code , patient_name , id_type , id_no , take_medicine_loc , push_type , scheduled_time , redirect_url , amount , dept_name , dept_code , dept_loc , dr_name , dr_lv_name , dr_lv_no , waiting_num , check_item , create_time , update_time , amp_trace_id , trace_id , org_trace_no , red_settle_id from pay_online_info where id = #{id}
